about_the_game:
Get a Starter Pack to fill your inventory and prepare to save Arkesia. Materials to Hone your gear, unique character skins to customize your look, a unique mount to travel on, Crystalline Aura to ease your journey, battle items, and more to help propel you on your new adventure.

With all the cosmetics of the other items on top of a cache of valuable honing materials, this pack is designed to put you on the fast track and will help prepare you for whatever dangers you encounter in Arkesia.

  • Ashuto Selection Chest
  • Crystalline Aura x 90 Days
  • Phoenix Plume x 100
  • Collective Battle Item Chest x 8
  • Frazio Selection Chest (Select 1 of 3)
  • Honorable Graduation Skins
  • Crystals x 400
  • Starter Pack Growth Honing Pack

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence, Blood and Gore, Suggestive Themes, Strong Language, and Use of Alcohol

detailed_description:
Get a Starter Pack to fill your inventory and prepare to save Arkesia. Materials to Hone your gear, unique character skins to customize your look, a unique mount to travel on, Crystalline Aura to ease your journey, battle items, and more to help propel you on your new adventure.

With all the cosmetics of the other items on top of a cache of valuable honing materials, this pack is designed to put you on the fast track and will help prepare you for whatever dangers you encounter in Arkesia.

  • Ashuto Selection Chest
  • Crystalline Aura x 90 Days
  • Phoenix Plume x 100
  • Collective Battle Item Chest x 8

name: Lost Ark Thirain Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD HD6850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play, offers in-game purchases
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play, offers in-game purchases
